topic.title: Linux Mint 19.1 Smaller Better Faster and Does More!
topic.body:
Linux Mint 19.1 is smaller better and faster. By far the best Linux distro I have used.
If you are using Mint 18 upgrading to 19.1 will save you about 80% ram usage and a speed increase of about 70% . Your speed may very depending on hardware. Updated software install center is faster and more informative. 

https://linuxmint.com/

How to install Linux Min 19 for the New Linux User!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G0AFuhVSvEk

Well worth the download and install.
